pr_title: Refactor CryptoTransferTransactionSupplier to only add token only transfers

timeline.message:
Refactor CryptoTransferTransactionSupplier to only add crypto or token transfers

Signed-off-by: Ian Jungmann <ian.jungmann@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: nit: perhaps if it's token transfer, the memo should say so?
timeline.author: xin-hedera

replies.bodyText: Good idea, moved that line into the if/else to reflect the two different types.
replies.author: ijungmann

timeline.message:
Change memo based on token or crypto transfer

Signed-off-by: Ian Jungmann <ian.jungmann@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why else vs the ability to do both if so configured?
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: I was about to comment that as well. We should probably add this scenario.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: I wasn't sure there was a valid use case for needing to do both, whereas there is an obvious need for the other two, and I wasn't sure just how much config we wanted to add here.  I can add an enum for the 3 cases and have it default to CRYPTO.
replies.author: ijungmann

replies.bodyText: Added an enum so all 3 scenarios are supported, and moved some code around to reduce duplication.
replies.author: ijungmann

timeline.message:
Add support for BOTH

Signed-off-by: Ian Jungmann <ian.jungmann@hedera.com>

timeline.author: steven-sheehy
